wikipedia_page.main: James Keers (10 December 1931 – 27 April 2020) was an English footballer who scored 15 goals from 73 appearances in the Football League Third Division North playing on the wing for Darlington in the 1950s. He also played non-league football for clubs including Evenwood Town and Annfield Plain.

response: * c. 29 April 2020: Jim Keers, 88, Darlington outside forward.
